title: Article App
description: Developed a full-featured article management app with an admin dashboard, rich text editor, and authentication using Next.js, MongoDB, Tailwind CSS, and Firebase Storage

title: Random Dot Kinematogram (RDK) Experiment App
description: Created an RDK experiment app with real-time data visualization and analysis, utilizing React.js, Firebase services, Canvas and Web Animation APIs

title: Lazybug | A Social Media Web App
description: Developed a full-stack social media app with Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and React.js, incorporating real-time chat, profile picture processing, and secure deployment
